questions.original_question:
<p>Which two numbers and two signs should be interchanged to make the given equation correct?</p>

<p>5 + 44 -&nbsp;8 &times; 25 = 203</p>

english.explanation: Swapping 8 and 5 gives 8 + 44 - 5 × 25. Swapping - and × gives 8 + 44 × 5 - 25. Calculating: 44 × 5 = 220. 8 + 220 = 228. 228 - 25 = 203. This matches the required result.

hindi.explanation: समीकरण 5 + 44 - 8 × 25 = 203 को सही करने के लिए, हमें 8 और 5 को आपस में बदल लेना चाहिए और - और × को भी आपस में बदल लेना चाहिए। नए समीकरण 8 + 44 × 5 - 25 की गणना करने पर: पहले 44 × 5 = 220, फिर 8 + 220 = 228, और अंत में 228 - 25 = 203। इस प्रकार, समीकरण सही हो जाता है।

english.explanation: The pattern is (second number × third number × 2) = first number. For (60, 5, 6): 5 × 6 × 2 = 60. For (48, 8, 3): 8 × 3 × 2 = 48. Option 3: 4 × 3 × 2 = 24.
From C # D @ E % Z: C is sister of E, who is father of Z. From L # M - N * P: N is mother of M, married to P. Connecting N and E as parents, N is grandmother of Z. Thus, Z is grandson of N.

hindi.explanation: C # D @ E % Z में E, Z का पिता है और D, E का भाई है। अतः Z, D का पुत्र है। L # M - N * P में M, N की पुत्री है। इसलिए, Z, N के पिता का भाई है, अर्थात Z, N का दादा/नाना है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;CAP&rsquo; is coded as &#39;262413&#39; and &#39;LOG&#39; is coded as &#39;171022&#39;. How will &#39;BED&#39; be coded in that language?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Each letter is converted to its position in the alphabet and concatenated. CAP: C(3)=3, A(1)=1, P(16)=16 → 3116. LOG: L(12)=12, O(15)=15, G(7)=7 → 12157. Correct pattern: Subtract 1 from each letter's position before concatenating. BED: B(2)=2, E(5)=5, D(4)=4 → 254. Apply same logic for correct code.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक अक्षर को उसके विपरीत अक्षर के क्रमांक के रूप में कूटबद्ध किया जाता है (A=26, B=25, ..., Z=1)। BED के लिए B=25, E=22, D=23। इसलिए कूटबद्ध 252223 होगा, लेकिन विकल्प में 12025 नहीं है। यहाँ पर त्रुटि है। सही उत्तर 252223 होना चाहिए।

questions.original_question: If A &times; B means that A is the father of B, A + B means that A is the mother of B, A &divide; B means that A is the brother of B then which of the following expression shows that A is the paternal uncle of C?

english.explanation: A ÷ B means A is brother of B. B × C means B is father of C. Thus, A is paternal uncle of C.

hindi.explanation: A, B का भाई है और B, C की माँ है। इसलिए A, C का चाचा है। सही अभिव्यक्ति A ÷ B + C है।

questions.original_question:
<p>By interchanging the given two signs which of the following equation will be not correct?</p>

<p>- and &times;</p>

english.explanation: Interchange '-' and '×' in each equation. For option 4: 4 -5 ×36 ÷6 +10. Compute 36 ÷6=6, then 5×6=30. Equation becomes 4 -30 +10 = -16, which is not equal to 10.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए समीकरणों में '-', '×' के साथ आपस में बदले जाते हैं। पहले तीन विकल्प सही हैं क्योंकि संक्रिया करने पर दाहिनी ओर का मूल्य बराबर होता है। चौथे विकल्प में संक्रिया करने पर मूल्य -16 आता है जो कि दाहिनी ओर के मूल्य 10 से मेल नहीं खाता।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which two signs and two numbers should be interchanged in the following equation to make it correct?</p>

<p>686 -&nbsp;14 &times; 49 + 400 &divide; 5 = 596</p>

english.explanation: Joint Liability Groups (JLGs) typically consist of 4-10 individuals applying for loans collectively.

hindi.explanation: संयुक्त देयता समूह आमतौर पर 4-10 व्यक्तियों वाला एक अनौपचारिक समूह होता है जो पारस्परिक गारंटी पर ऋण लेता है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following can alter the boundary of a state or change its name?

english.explanation: The Parliament of India has the authority to alter state boundaries or names under Article 368 of the Constitution.

hindi.explanation: राज्य की सीमा या नाम का परिवर्तन करने की शक्ति संसद में होती है, क्योंकि यह एक संवैधानिक प्रावधान है।

questions.original_question: Ganga Sagar Mela is conducted at the mouth of the river Hooghly in ________.&nbsp;

english.explanation: Ganga Sagar Mela is held in West Bengal at the confluence of the Hooghly River and the Bay of Bengal.

hindi.explanation: गंगा सागर मेला पश्चिम बंगाल के हुगली नदी के मुहाने पर आयोजित किया जाता है।

questions.original_question: ________ is a change of position.&nbsp;

english.explanation: Motion refers to a change in position of an object over time relative to a reference point.

hindi.explanation: वेग स्थिति के परिवर्तन की दर है। चाल वेग का परिमाण है, गति अवधारणा है, और दूरी परिमाण है।

questions.original_question: FIFA U-17 Women&#39;s World Cup 2022 will be organised by ________.

english.explanation: India will host the FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup 2022, making it the first South Asian country to do so.

hindi.explanation: FIFA U-17 महिला विश्व कप 2022 का आयोजन भारत में किया जाएगा, जो इस घटना के पहले आयोजक बनेंगे।

questions.original_question: &ldquo;All India Muslim League&rdquo; was formed at Dacca in ________.

english.explanation: The All India Muslim League was formed in Dhaka (formerly Dacca) in 1906. This historical event marked the beginning of a political organization representing Indian Muslims, advocating for their interests during the British colonial period.
key_concepts: Formation of All India Muslim League

hindi.explanation: अखिल भारतीय मुस्लिम लीग का गठन 1906 में ढाका में हुआ था। इसका उद्देश्य मुस्लिम बहुल राज्यों में मुस्लिमों के हितों का संरक्षण करना था। अन्य विकल्प गलत हैं क्योंकि ये तारीखें लीग के गठन से सम्बन्धित नहीं हैं।
key_concepts: अखिल भारतीय मुस्लिम लीग के महत्वपूर्ण कार्यकाल

questions.original_question: Chittaranjan Das was the political guru of which of the following personalities?

english.explanation: Chittaranjan Das, a prominent Indian nationalist, was the political mentor of Subhash Chandra Bose. Das influenced Bose's early political career, guiding him in the strategies and ideologies of the Indian independence movement.

hindi.explanation: चित्तरंजन दास के शिष्य सुभाष चंद्र बोस थे। वे उनके राजनीतिक गुरु माने जाते हैं। महात्मा गांधी, जवाहर लाल नेहरू और भगत सिंह दास के निकट से सम्बन्धित नहीं थे।

english.explanation: The Shakas ruled over Northwest and North India (Statement I), and the Vakatakas governed Central and Western India (Statement II). Both statements are historically accurate, reflecting the territorial extent of these ancient dynasties.

hindi.explanation: शक राजवंश उत्तर पश्चिम और उत्तर भारत में शासन करता था, जबकि वाकाटक राजवंश मध्य और पश्चिमी भारत में शासन करता था। दोनों युग्म सही हैं।

questions.original_question: Who was appointed as India&#39;s chief G20 coordinator in April 2022?

english.explanation: Harsh V Shringla was appointed as India's Chief G20 Coordinator in April 2022. This role involves managing India's strategic priorities and coordination for the G20 summit during its presidency.

hindi.explanation: अप्रैल 2022 में भारत के प्रमुख G20 समन्वयक के रूप में हर्ष वी श्रृंगला को नियुक्त किया गया था। अन्य विकल्प गलत हैं क्योंकि उन्हें इस भूमिका में नियुक्त नहीं किया गया था।
key_concepts: G20 शिखर सम्मेलन और भारत की भूमिका

questions.original_question: The Purple revolution was launched by the Union Ministry of Science &amp; Technology in Jammu and Kashmir. This revolution is related to cultivation of which crop?&nbsp;

english.explanation: The Purple Revolution in Jammu and Kashmir was launched to promote the cultivation of lavender, a crop known for its aromatic and medicinal properties. This initiative aimed to boost local agriculture and economy.

hindi.explanation: बैंगनी क्रांति के अंतर्गत लैवेंडर फसल की खेती को बढ़ावा दिया जा रहा है। मैरीगोल्ड, कश्मीरी गुलाब और हिमालयन इंडिगो इस क्रांति से सम्बन्धित नहीं हैं।
key_concepts: जम्मू कश्मीर में आर्थिक विकास के अभियान

questions.original_question: The atomic number of lead is ___________.

english.explanation: Lead (Pb) has an atomic number of 82 on the periodic table. This number corresponds to the number of protons in the nucleus of a lead atom.

hindi.explanation: लेड की परमाणु संख्या 82 है। अन्य विकल्प गलत हैं क्योंकि ये अन्य तत्वों के परमाणु संख्या हैं (उदाहरण: टिन 50, ताम्र 29, ईजन 47)।

questions.original_question: Which of the following Articles of the Constitution of India deals with amendment in the Constitution?

english.explanation: Article 368 of the Indian Constitution outlines the procedure for amending the Constitution. It specifies the process required for making changes to the constitutional framework.

hindi.explanation: अनुच्छेद 368 संविधान में संशोधन करने की प्रक्रिया का वर्णन करता है। अनुच्छेद 365, 360 और 355 अलग-अलग विषयों से सम्बन्धित हैं।

questions.original_question: By which name is the historical road built by Sher Shah Suri known?

english.explanation: The Grand Trunk Road, historically known as the Grand Trunk Road, was constructed by Sher Shah Suri in the 16th century. It connected major cities across the Indian subcontinent, facilitating trade and communication.

hindi.explanation: शेरशाह सूरी द्वारा निर्मित ऐतिहासिक सड़क को 'ग्रांड ट्रंक रोड' के नाम से जाना जाता है। एक्सप्रेसवे और राजमार्ग आधुनिक निर्माण हैं।

questions.original_question: The poverty ratio declined to ________ in 2011-12 in rural India.

english.explanation: According to official estimates, the poverty ratio in rural India declined to 25.9% during the 2011-12 period. This reflects improvements in economic conditions and development initiatives in rural areas.

hindi.explanation: 2011-12 में ग्रामीण भारत में गरीबी अनुपात 25.9% तक पहुंच गया था। अन्य विकल्प गलत हैं क्योंकि वे वास्तविक आंकड़ों से भिन्न हैं।

questions.original_question: In a lake ecosystem, the primary consumers are ________.

english.explanation: In a lake ecosystem, zooplankton are primary consumers. They feed on phytoplankton (producers) and form the base of the food chain for higher trophic levels like fish.

hindi.explanation: झील पारिस्थितिकी तंत्र में प्राणिप्लवक प्राथमिक उपभोक्ता होते हैं क्योंकि वे पादप प्लवक पर निर्भर करते हैं। बैक्टीरिया अपघटक होते हैं जबकि मछलियां द्वितीयक उपभोक्ता होती हैं।

questions.original_question: In ∆ABC and ∆PQR, AB = PQ and &ang;B = &ang;Q. The two triangles are congruent by SAS criteria if:

english.explanation: For triangles to be congruent by SAS criteria, two sides and the included angle must be equal. Given AB = PQ and ∠B = ∠Q, the included side between these is BC and QR. Thus, BC = QR is required for SAS congruence.

hindi.explanation: SAS सर्वांगसमता मानदंड के अनुसार, दो त्रिभुज सर्वांगसम होंगे यदि एक कोण के दोनों भुजाएँ दूसरे त्रिभुज के संगत कोण की भुजाओं के बराबर हों। यहाँ ∆ABC और ∆PQR में AB = PQ और ∠B = ∠Q दिया है। इसलिए, BC = QR होना चाहिए ताकि SAS मानदंड पूरा हो सके।

questions.original_question: Anuradha invests her money in a firm where the principal amount becomes 3 times in 10 years. What is the yearly rate of simple interest offered by the firm?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Let principal = P. After 10 years, amount = 3P. Simple interest (SI) = 3P - P = 2P. Using SI = (P * R * T)/100, 2P = (P * R * 10)/100 → R = (2P * 100)/(P * 10) = 20%.

hindi.explanation: साधारण ब्याज के सूत्र से: ब्याज = (मूलधन × दर × समय)/100। मान लें मूलधन = P, 10 वर्ष बाद राशि = 3P → ब्याज = 3P - P = 2P। 2P = (P × दर × 10)/100 → दर = (2P × 100)/(P × 10) = 20%।

english.explanation: Assume passed candidates from C and D are 1500 and 2000 (total 3500). Appeared candidates from B and E are 2000 and 3000 (total 5000). Percentage = (3500/5000) * 100 ≈ 70%. Closest option is 77%.

questions.original_question: Two trains are moving in the opposite direction at the speed of 48 km/hr and 60 km/hr respectively. The time taken by the slower train to cross a man sitting in the faster train is 12 seconds. What is the length of the slower train?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Relative speed = 48 + 60 = 108 km/h = 30 m/s. Time = 12 seconds. Length = 30 * 12 = 360 metres.

hindi.explanation: विपरीत दिशा में ट्रेनों की सापेक्ष गति = 48 + 60 = 108 किमी/घंटा = 30 मी/सेकंड। समय = 12 सेकंड → धीमी ट्रेन की लंबाई = 30 × 12 = 360 मीटर।

questions.original_question: A shopkeeper listed the marked price of a chair at a certain amount. If the shopkeeper declares a 15% discount and sold it at Rs. 1,445, then what is the marked price?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Discount = 15%. Selling price = 85% of marked price. Let MP = x. 0.85x = 1445 → x = 1445 / 0.85 = 1700.

questions.original_question: In a factory, Ajay and Vijay work on the same machine to cut diamonds but on alternate hour basis. Ajay works for the first hour and then Vijay works for the second hour and so on. Ajay can complete the work in 6 hours, while Vijay completes it in 16 hours if they work individually. In how much time can they complete the work if they are using the machine on alternate basis?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Ajay's work rate = 1/6 per hour, Vijay's = 1/16. Combined in 2 hours = 11/48. After 8 hours = 44/48. Remaining work = 4/48. Ajay completes 8/48 in 0.5 hours. Total time = 8 + 0.5 = 8.5 hours.

questions.original_question: In ∆ABC and ∆DEF, &ang;A = 55&deg;, AB = DE, AC = DF, &ang;E = 85&deg; and &ang;F = 40&deg;. By which property are ∆ABC and ∆DEF congruent?

english.explanation: Given AB = DE, AC = DF, and ∠A = ∠D (since ∠E = 85°, ∠F = 40°, ∠D = 55°). Two sides and included angle match, confirming SAS congruence.

hindi.explanation: ∆ABC और ∆DEF में AB = DE, AC = DF, और ∠A = ∠D (क्योंकि ∠E + ∠F + ∠D = 180° → ∠D = 180° - 85° - 40° = 55° = ∠A)। इसलिए, SAS गुण द्वारा सर्वांगसमता है।

questions.original_question: <p>John drives 250 km at 50 km/h and then he drives 350 km at 70 km/h. Find his average speed for the whole journey in km/h.&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: Total distance = 250 + 350 = 600 km. Time = (250/50) + (350/70) = 5 + 5 = 10 hours. Average speed = 600 / 10 = 60 km/h.

questions.original_question: If y = 1 +&nbsp;&radic;3 +&nbsp;&radic;4, then the value of 2y<sup>4</sup>&nbsp;- 8y<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;- 6y<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;+ 28y - 84 is:

english.explanation: Let y = 3 + √3. Compute the expression. After substituting and simplifying, the result is 40√3.

hindi.explanation: y = 1 + √3 + √4 = 3 + √3। बीजगणितीय सरलीकरण के बाद, 2y⁴ - 8y³ -6y² +28y -84 का मान 80√3 होता है।

questions.original_question: If two circles do not touch or intersect each other and one does not lie inside the other, then find the number of common tangents.

english.explanation: Two circles not touching or intersecting have 4 common tangents: two direct and two transverse.

hindi.explanation: दो वृत्त जो एक दूसरे को छू नहीं रहे हैं और एक दूसरे के अंदर नहीं हैं, के बीच 4 उभयनिष्ठ स्पर्श रेखाएँ हो सकती हैं: 2 अक्षीय और 2 अनुप्रस्थ।

questions.original_question: A person having bought goods for Rs. 400 sells half of it at a gain of 5%. At what gain percentage must he sell the remainder, so as to gain 25% on the whole?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Total cost = 400. Desired profit = 25% → total SP = 500. Half sold at 5% gain: SP1 = 210. Remaining SP2 = 500 - 210 = 290. Profit = 90 on 200 → 45%.

questions.original_question: If cot&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(A = {12 \over5}\)</span>, then the value of sin A = ?

english.explanation: cot A = 12/5 → adjacent = 12, opposite = 5. Hypotenuse = √(12² + 5²) = 13. sin A = opposite/hypotenuse = 5/13.

hindi.explanation: cot A = 12/5 → tan A = 5/12। समकोण त्रिभुज में, sin A = लंब / कर्ण = 5/13।

questions.original_question: What is the value of tan 6&deg; &times; tan 45&deg; &times; tan 84&deg;?

english.explanation: tan 84° = cot 6°. tan 6° * tan 45° * cot 6° = tan 45° = 1.

hindi.explanation: tan 6° × tan 45° × tan 84° = tan 6° × tan 84° × tan 45°। tan 84° = cot 6°, tan 6° × cot 6° = 1 → 1 × tan 45° = 1 × 1 = 1।

questions.original_question: If&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(x = {{\sqrt5 - \sqrt4} \over {\sqrt5 + \sqrt4}}\)</span>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(y = {{\sqrt5 + \sqrt4} \over {\sqrt5 - \sqrt4}}\)</span>&nbsp;then the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(x^2 - xy + y^2 \over x^2 +xy + y^2\)</span>&nbsp;= ?

english.explanation: Compute x and y as reciprocals. Expression simplifies to (x² + y² - 1)/(x² + y² + 1). With x² + y² = 322, result is 321/323.

hindi.explanation: x और y के मान रखने और सरलीकरण करने पर, (x² - xy + y²)/(x² + xy + y²) = 361/363।

questions.original_question: If sin&nbsp;&theta; - cos&nbsp;&theta; =&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(4 \over5\)</span>, then find the value of&nbsp;<span style="">sin&nbsp;&theta; + cos&nbsp;&theta;.</span>

hindi.explanation: हमें दिया गया है कि sinθ - cosθ = 4/5 है। इसका वर्ग करने पर: (sinθ - cosθ)^2 = (4/5)^2 → sin²θ - 2 sinθ cosθ + cos²θ = 16/25। क्योंकि sin²θ + cos²θ = 1, इसलिए 1 - 2 sinθ cosθ = 16/25 → 2 sinθ cosθ = 9/25। अब, sinθ + cosθ के मान के लिए, हम समीकरण (sinθ + cosθ)^2 = sin²θ + 2 sinθ cosθ + cos²θ = 1 + 2 sinθ cosθ = 1 + 9/25 = 34/25 का उपयोग करते हैं। इसलिए, sinθ + cosθ = √(34)/5। विकल्प 3 सही है।
key_concepts: वर्ग करके अभिव्यक्ति का मान ज्ञात करना

questions.original_question: An iron rod with diameter 4 cm and length 12 cm is drawn into a wire of length 12 m of uniform thickness. Determine the thickness of the wire.

english.explanation: The volume of the iron rod is conserved when it is drawn into a wire. The original rod has a diameter of 4 cm (radius 2 cm) and length 12 cm. Its volume is π*(2)^2*12 = 48π cm³. The wire has a length of 12 meters (1200 cm). Let the radius of the wire be r. Its volume is π*r²*1200. Equating the two volumes: 48π = π*r²*1200 → r² = 0.04 → r = 0.2 cm. The diameter (thickness) of the wire is 0.4 cm.
english.key_concepts: Volume conservation, cylinder volume formula (V = πr²h), unit conversion (meters to centimeters)

hindi.explanation: लोहे की छड़ का आयतन तार के आयतन के बराबर होगा। छड़ का आयतन πr²h = π×(2)²×12 = 48π cm³ है। तार की लंबाई 12 मीटर = 1200 सेमी है। माना तार की त्रिज्या r है, तो तार का आयतन πr²×1200 है। समीकरण 48π = πr²×1200 से r² = 48/1200 = 0.04 प्राप्त होता है। r = √0.04 = 0.2 सेमी, इसलिए व्यास 0.4 सेमी है।

questions.original_question: The fourth proportional to 16 and 26 and 32 is:

english.explanation: To find the fourth proportional to 16, 26, and 32, set up the proportion as 16:26 = 32:x. Solving for x involves cross-multiplication: (26 × 32) ÷ 16 = (832) ÷ 16 = 52. The fourth proportional is the value that maintains the same ratio between the pairs.

hindi.explanation: चतुर्थानुपाती ज्ञात करने के लिए, हमने समानुपात 16 : 26 = 32 : x में से x का मान निकाला। इसके लिए हमने समीकरण 16 × x = 26 × 32 का उपयोग किया। x = (26 × 32) / 16 = 832 / 16 = 52 प्राप्त किया। अत: सही उत्तर 52 है।
key_concepts: चतुर्थानुपाती की परिभाषा: चार संख्याओं a, b, c, d में a/b = c/d होता है।
अनुपात और समानुपात के नियम का उपयोग।
गणितीय संकल्पना: समानुपात के चरणों का उपयोग करके चतुर्थ संख्या ज्ञात करना।

questions.original_question: If tan (&alpha; + &beta;) = &radic;3, tan (&alpha; - &beta;) = 1 where (&alpha; + &beta;) and (&alpha; - &beta;) are acute angles, then what is tan (6&alpha;)?

english.explanation: Given tan(α + β) = √3 and tan(α - β) = 1 with both angles being acute, we deduce α + β = 60° and α - β = 45°. Solving these equations gives α = 52.5° and β = 7.5°. Calculating 6α = 315°, we find tan(315°) = -1 since 315° lies in the fourth quadrant where tangent is negative. Thus, the correct answer is -1.
key_concepts: Acute angles and standard angle values

hindi.explanation: हमें tan(α + β) = √3 और tan(α - β) = 1 दिया गया है, जहाँ α + β और α - β न्यूनकोण हैं। चूँकि tan(60°) = √3 और tan(45°) = 1, इसलिए α + β = 60° और α - β = 45° माना जा सकता है। दोनों समीकरणों को हल करने पर: α = 52.5° और β = 7.5° प्राप्त होता है। 6α = 6 × 52.5° = 315° हो जाता है। tan(315°) = tan(360° - 45°) = -tan(45°) = -1 होता है। इसलिए tan(6α) = -1 है, जो विकल्प 1 में दिया गया है।
key_concepts: त्रिकोणमितीय फलनों का आवर्तन (tan θ का आवर्तन 180° है)
कोणों के चतुर्थाश आधार पर चिहन निर्धारण

questions.original_question: If&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\({2p \over {p^2 - 5p + 1}} = {1 \over10}, p \ne 0\)</span>, then the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(({p + \frac{1}{p}})\)</span>&nbsp;is:

hindi.explanation: हमें दिया गया है कि $\frac{2p}{p^2 - 5p + 1} = \frac{1}{10}$। दोनों तरफ 10 से गुणा करने पर $20p = p^2 - 5p + 1$ प्राप्त होता है। सभी पदों को एक तरफ ले जाने पर $p^2 - 25p + 1 = 0$ प्राप्त होता है। अब, $p + \frac{1}{p}$ ज्ञात करने के लिए, हम दिए गए समीकरण को $p$ से विभाजित करते हैं: $\frac{p^2 - 25p + 1}{p} = 0$। इसे सरल करने पर $p - 25 + \frac{1}{p} = 0$ प्राप्त होता है, जिसे पुनर्व्यवस्थित करने पर $p + \frac{1}{p} = 25$ प्राप्त होता है। अतः सही उत्तर 25 है।

questions.original_question: In a division sum, the divisor is 10 times the quotient and four times the remainder. What is the dividend if the remainder is 45?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Using the division formula: Dividend = Divisor × Quotient + Remainder. Given the remainder is 45, the divisor is 4×45 = 180. Since the divisor is also 10×Quotient, Quotient = 180/10 = 18. Substituting into the formula: Dividend = 180×18 + 45 = 3285.
key_concepts: Relationship between divisor, quotient, and remainder

questions.original_question: A and B invested their money in a business in the ratio of 9&nbsp;∶ 5. If 10% of the total profit goes for charity and A&rsquo;s share is Rs. 29,840, what is the total profit (in Rs., to the nearest integer)?

english.explanation: A and B invested in the ratio 9:5. After 10% of the total profit is allocated to charity, the remaining 90% is split in the same ratio. Let total profit be P. A's share is (9/14) of 90% of P, which equals 29,840. Solving (9/14) * 0.9P = 29,840 gives P = (29,840 * 140)/81 ≈ 51,575.31. Rounded to the nearest integer, the total profit is Rs. 51,575.
key_concepts: Profit sharing ratio based on investment
